name: Undermind
headline: An AI agent for scientific research
description:
At Undermind, we're building a search engine that can handle extremely complex questions. It’s geared at experts, like research scientists and doctors, who need to find very specific resources to solve high-stakes problems. 

We’ve rebuilt search from the ground up to address this. Our new approach employs high-quality LLMs to adaptively explore a database, mimicking how a human researcher carefully discovers information. This approach dramatically outperforms (by 10-50x) traditional keyword search and other modern AI-based retrieval methods.

Our first target users are the 50 million researchers searching for scientific literature on PubMed and Google Scholar every month. We’ve have users paying us $200-$500 per seat per year, from fields like medicine, ML, biotech, finance, and more.

founders.name: Joshua Ramette, Founder
founders.description: Josh is the co-founder and CEO at Undermind. He has research experience in gravitational-wave astrophysics (LIGO), particle physics (CERN), atomic physics, and quantum information science. He did his PhD at MIT studying quantum computing architecture design and inventing techniques for generating entangled multi-particle states using atom-light interactions, with 3 patents pending and 6 peer-reviewed publications.

founders.name: Tom Hartke, Founder
founders.description: Tom is the co-founder and CTO at Undermind. He studied physics at Princeton, then did his PhD in quantum physics at MIT. His thesis was recognized by the American Physical Society as one of the top 4 theses in the field of atomic physics in 2022, and he has published 10 papers in the field, including two in Nature and Science. Tom has deep expertise in building and deploying complex systems.

markdown:
raw_markdown='[ ![Logo](https://www.undermind.ai/static/UndermindLettersLogo.png) Undermind ](https://www.undermind.ai/</home/>)
  * [Home](https://www.undermind.ai/</home/>)
  * [Search](https://www.undermind.ai/</query_app/query/>)
  * [Pricing](https://www.undermind.ai/</payments/subscribe/>)
  * [Sign In](https://www.undermind.ai/</accounts/login/>)
  * [Sign Up](https://www.undermind.ai/</accounts/signup/>)


#  Radically better research, radically faster 
Our AI assistant carefully reads hundreds of academic papers for you, finding exactly what you need, no matter how complex. 
  * [Try searching free](https://www.undermind.ai/</accounts/signup/>)
  * [Learn more ](https://www.undermind.ai/<#features>)


###### Trusted and Used by Researchers at
![MIT Logo](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/MIT_logo.png)
![Harvard Logo](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/Harvard_logo.svg)
![Caltech Logo](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/Caltech_logo.png)
![Princeton Logo](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/Princeton_logo.png)
![Berkeley Logo](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/Berkeley_logo.svg)
![Cambridge Logo](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/Cambridge_logo.png)
## An Intelligent Assistant
Imagine having a research assistant who works tirelessly for you. Instead of spending hours searching for answers, you’d have the best knowledge and solutions at your fingertips—instantly. Now, with cutting-edge AI, it’s a reality. 
### Incredibly complex topics
Talk to Undermind like you would a smart colleague. 
### Accurate results
Undermind finds the precise papers you need, with clear explanations about why they matter. 
### Comprehensive discovery
Undermind analyzes hundreds of papers, learning as it goes — and knows how far it needs to look to find everything. 
### Powerful analysis
Ask followup questions to deeply and quickly understand the results. 
## What Researchers Say
"Undermind’s unique, **high-powered search and synthesis algorithms** give me exactly the information I need, and it’s come through for me at many crucial moments in my technical work. Along with many others on our team, I’m a paying subscriber, and I think anyone searching the scientific or technical literature should be using this incredible tool." 
![author](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/testimonial_headshots/DanRechtHeadshot.jpeg)
#### Dan Recht
Applied Physics PhD, hard-tech entrepreneur, and startup advisor
"Undermind is easily **the best lit search tool out there**. My team and I have been using it for months and are now long-term subscribers. It does what ChatGPT can’t: gives you precise examples from which it synthesizes a thorough summary, even for highly specialized and complex research topics. It’s **had a huge impact on our work** , for example by helping us quickly identify the right mouse models to test our immune-modulating drugs, saving us potentially months of troubleshooting." 
![author](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/testimonial_headshots/WillOlsenHeadshot.jpeg)
#### Will Olsen
Co-founder and CEO at Engage Bio
"I’ve been using Undermind along with my team and we love this product. It’s amazing how it can dig up obscure papers that would **take days or weeks to try to find otherwise**. It’s incredibly valuable because it directly provides precisely the information you need. I’ve had our whole R&D team at Actipulse set up with subscription access for a while now and we are thrilled with it!" 
![author](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/testimonial_headshots/GabrielVillafuerteHeadshot.jpeg)
#### Gabriel Villafuerte
MD/PhD and Chief Medical Officer, Actipulse Neuroscience
## See how it works
2 min
## A Next Generation, AI-Powered, Research System
Undermind isn't just a search engine — it _autonomously researches an entire complex topic for you._
Mimicking a human's careful, systematic discovery process, Undermind uses advanced language models to recognize crucial information and learn while it does research. It runs down citation trails, and adapts its search strategy based on what it finds, leading to unprecedented accuracy and comprehensiveness. 
We [benchmarked](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/www.undermind.ai/static/Undermind_whitepaper.pdf>) the first version of Undermind to be **10-50x** better than Google Scholar, and we've been improving ever since. 
![about-Ai-powered-search-image](https://www.undermind.ai/static/AIPoweredSearch.png)
## Solve Real, Complex Problems
[ Quantum Computing Has anyone attempted shuttling trapped ions in three dimensions, not two dimensions, for quantum computing applications? ](https://www.undermind.ai/</query_app/display_one_search/b3767fb7b65e9a7e90273d02558b2cc376258d1b9e58376f0b7c0924b85f694a/>)
[ Artificial Intelligence I want to find recent papers on using AI for creating agent-like pipelines to manage a coding database, ideally including the metrics, architecture, etc. ](https://www.undermind.ai/</query_app/display_one_search/66b70a0fa6b78d00d94aeb0788b30925f90b801022ccb433317f933c9390891d/>)
[ Information Science I want to understand how usage rates on Google Scholar change when the search latency is made longer or shorter. What is the quantitative effect? ](https://www.undermind.ai/</query_app/display_one_search/c53d4f34e990e057c729d7cb34d97ba0c70aeae524fd9ca7a66c3807a3f37c10/>)
[ Sociology I want research articles on the evolutionary purpose of romantic love in humans, particularly its role in parental investment and cooperation for offspring survival. ](https://www.undermind.ai/</query_app/display_one_search/c87c6d79747cdbb877bdbc0ce840c86c21a3f9adbeade7c7a08f33d54b8ad01c/>)
[ Neuroscience I want to investigate the molecular mechanism underlying Hebbian learning. Is there any involvement of hormone-like chemicals such as nerve growth factor? ](https://www.undermind.ai/</query_app/display_one_search/0484b7604bc82e77a2d88c729b0808b5791ca14f61e6c37db00c35428d0ec232/>)
[ Atomic Physics I want to find all papers demonstrating laser cooling to Bose-Einstein condensation (BEC) experimentally, without using evaporative cooling. ](https://www.undermind.ai/</query_app/display_one_search/c5f77f862ae783b7738e9931db42a8590b5567af4ba9759e1d4b7ca5b65dc9f5/>)
[Try your own search now](https://www.undermind.ai/</accounts/signup/>)
![shape](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/slash_shape.svg)
## Frequently Asked Questions
What scientific databases do you search?
We cover all fields of science using the [Semantic Scholar](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/www.semanticscholar.org/>) database of over 200 million articles, which contains PubMed, ArXiv, and [many other databases](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/www.semanticscholar.org/about/publishers>). 
Why does it take 3-5 min to complete?
Undermind is thoroughly researching your topic, not just running a quick search. During those few minutes, it’s scanning through hundreds of papers, cross comparing and ranking sources, and adapting its strategy as it learns about your topic. 
Do you search full texts, or just abstracts?
Undermind Free Tier searches abstracts and metadata. In addition, for users who upgrade to our Pro tier, we provide more compute to also search the full texts of nearly all open access and preprint articles. 
What makes Undermind different?
Every other "search engine" you've used before just returns approximate recommendations, not precisely relevant results. As researchers ourselves, we know what you need is often so complex that you have to wade through hundreds of results. It's painful. You should think of Undermind as sending a talented colleague to do a few days of research for you, working hard to find exactly what you need. 
It didn't find my paper. Why?
If you're looking for a very specific paper, there's a small chance it isn't present in the [Semantic Scholar](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/www.semanticscholar.org/>) database of over 200 million articles which we draw from. Another possibility is that the Undermind search has not yet converged. Unlike in a traditional search engine, where all results are returned at once, ordered from best to worst, we perform a search in stages, like you would as you carefully search the literature. We look at a the most promising set of papers first, and depending on the difficulty of finding relevant results within these papers, we may not discover all the relevant papers in this first pass. By statistically modeling this process, we can determine what fraction of relevant papers we have likely found. If your paper didn't show up at first, it's likely the search system knows it has not yet found everything (and the report summary will tell you). You can deploy more computation ("extend" the search) to find the rest. See our [whitepaper](https://www.undermind.ai/</static/Undermind_whitepaper.pdf>) for additional explanation. 
Why the name "Undermind"?
Undermind represents the **intelligence that supports and underpins your work**. Like the roots of a tree, it provides a **deep, rich foundation of knowledge** , helping you uncover insights that fuel discovery. 
## Built by Researchers, for Researchers
Undermind was founded by **two MIT PhDs in quantum physics** , bringing decades of experience in **deep research, AI, and scientific discovery**. We’ve lived the struggle of sifting through endless papers—so we built Undermind to revolutionize the way researchers find knowledge. 
![shape](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/josh_headshot.jpeg)
##### Josh Ramette
###### CEO
  * [ ](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/twitter.com/RametteJoshua>)
  * [ ](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/joshua-ramette-50984791/>)


![shape](https://www.undermind.ai/static/homepage/tom_headshot.jpeg)
##### Tom Hartke
###### CTO
  * [ ](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/twitter.com/tom_hartke>)
  * [ ](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/thomas-hartke-229a0679/>)


[Try Undermind now](https://www.undermind.ai/</accounts/signup/>)
##### Undermind: Deep scientific search
  * [Terms of use](https://www.undermind.ai/</terms_of_use/>)
  * |
  * [Privacy policy](https://www.undermind.ai/</privacy_policy/>)
  * |
  * © 2025 Undermind


[ Twitter ](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/twitter.com/UndermindAI>) [ LinkedIn ](https://www.undermind.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/undermind-ai>)
Contact us

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Undermind**

**Mission**: Undermind aims to revolutionize scientific research with an AI agent that acts as a powerful assistant, enabling researchers, doctors, and other experts to navigate complex questions efficiently.

**Foundation**: Founded in 2023, Undermind is a part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, situated in San Francisco, and currently operates with a small but agile team of two.

**Innovation in Search**: Traditional keyword searches just don't cut it for serious researchers. This is where Undermind steps in. It has completely reimagined the search engine experience tailored specifically for high-stakes scientific inquiry. Using sophisticated large language models (LLMs), Undermind can search through vast databases, simulating a thorough, human-like research methodology. Unlike traditional tools, Undermind can deliver results that are **10-50 times more accurate**, helping researchers swiftly find precise resources.

**Target Audience**: The platform primarily caters to the 50 million researchers who rely on resources like PubMed and Google Scholar each month, charging between $200 and $500 annually per user from fields such as medicine, machine learning, biotech, and finance.

**User Experience**: Undermind's design allows researchers to interact with the AI as they would with a smart colleague. It deciphers complex topics, digging through hundreds of academic papers to unearth exactly what's needed. Users gain access to accurate results presented with contextual explanations, complemented by the ability to ask follow-up questions—ensuring a deep understanding of the material.

**Testimonials**: Early users, like researchers from prestigious institutions such as MIT and Harvard, emphasize the high-powered synthesis algorithms that deliver timely, relevant insights, drastically improving their research workflows.

**Critical Features**:
- **Autonomous Research**: Undermind doesn’t just search; it performs an independent investigation into intricate topics, improving accuracy with every query.
- **Database Coverage**: It pulls from the extensive Semantic Scholar database containing over 200 million articles, enveloping numerous fields of science.
- **Time Efficiency**: While typical searches may yield quick results, Undermind invests a few minutes to meticulously analyze and present the most relevant information—a game-changer for serious investigations.

**Founders' Background**: Built by two MIT PhDs with deep expertise in quantum physics and AI, Undermind is rooted in an understanding of the daunting challenges researchers face in sifting through vast amounts of literature.

**Contact and Engagement**: For research professionals looking to streamline their literature search or gain insights at a new level, Undermind offers a free trial, encouraging them to experience firsthand how it can transform their research experience.

In a nutshell, if you're in the business of complex research, Undermind is your new go-to assistant—ready to empower you to conduct deeper, faster, and more precise scientific exploration. 

**Website**: Explore Undermind at [undermind.ai](https://www.undermind.ai).
